entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Port-Cartier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:57 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
